<div align="center">
    
# Darkerest

A dark theme for Pinterest + some UI visual improvements.

[![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/badge/Install%20directly%20with-Stylus-285959.svg)](https://userstyles.world/api/style/18533.user.css)

[![Install through UserStyles.world](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=%23193652&label=UserStyles.world&query=total_installs&suffix=%20installs&url=https%3A%2F%2Fuserstyles.world%2Fapi%2Fstyle%2Fstats%2F18533&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://userstyles.world/style/18533/darkerest)

[![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/woidzero/darkerest.svg?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/woidzero/darkerest)

</div>

## Installation

To install this style you need a <a href="https://github.com/openstyles/stylus#stylus">Stylus</a> or other userstyle manager.

<a href="https://userstyles.world/api/style/18533.user.css"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Install%20directly%20with-Stylus-285959.svg"></a>
